scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
scripts.build-window-manager: rm ./assets/window-manager; swift build -c release --package-path swift  && cp swift/.build/release/window-manager ./assets/window-manager && chmod +x ./assets/window-manager
scripts.swift-lint: cd swift && swift package plugin swiftlint
scripts.swift-lint-fix: cd swift && swift package plugin swiftlint --autocorrect
